verses.name: Genesis 27:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when Isaac was old, and his eyes were dim, so that he could not see, he called Esau his eldest son, and said unto him, My son: and he said unto him, Behold, here am I.

verses.name: Genesis 27:2
verses.text: And he said, Behold now, I am old, I know not the day of my death:

verses.name: Genesis 27:3
verses.text: Now therefore take, I pray thee, thy weapons, thy quiver and thy bow, and go out to the field, and take me some venison;
